Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% %pron(i,was/were)% creepy into giving %r% some kind of eastern European massage
%i% tried to tickle %r% and it was all like inappropriate
%i% kissed %r% after some sexy nerd talk

%i% told %r% %prons(r,he/she)%'d never get what %prons(r,he/she)% needs from %o%

%i% tried to poke %r% or something weird like that

%i% used sexy poses to woo over %pron(i,his/her)% enemy's %gender(r,boyfriend,girlfriend)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%. Long day?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Tell me about it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I bet I know what you need...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey! Quit it! Quit it!
You spaz.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %random(fair,my darling,young)% %r%.
%random(Aren't you looking delectable today,My but you're looking ravishing today,What a charming outfit you're wearing,The chill air brings no cold to your radiant face)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: wtf did you just touch my ear?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %buddy%, how's it going? Hey, you look really tense. Who wants a massage?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh, no, that's okay.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No really, I know this great technique, it's from %random(Germany,Luxembourg,Poland,Moldova,the Ukraine,Latvia)%... it feels like a thousand tiny butterflies landing on your...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I said no, okay! Quit it!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Geez, sorry.
Oh, hey, %r%. You'll never guess what I've got here.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Tell me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, nothing much. Just a %toc1%. You want?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Me likey-wanty.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well you're going to have to come get it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, all the way over there?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: All the way over here behind my back. Can you reach that far?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Someday, you're going to be somebody's %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %gender(r,stud-muffin,babe)%. Ooh, lookin fine.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Excuse me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I bet I know what you need...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeaachh! Don't touch me!
Get the freak away.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%. %random(You know what would look good on your lips? My lips.,You know what I'm thinking? We haven't kissed since last period.,Can I ask my sweetheart for a kiss?,Give me some sugar baby.)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: My thoughts exactly, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're the best.

Hello, %r%. You know, all I could think about in %random(math class today was integrating U and I.,chemistry today was the strength of our covalent bond.,physics today was the potential energy of our relationship trajectory.,quantum mechanics class today was the set of analytic solutions of Schrödinger's equation that includes the quantum harmonic oscillations in your lips.)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %sweetie%, %if(0,my thoughts precisely)else(I don't know what you're talking about but it turns me on)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You balance my equation, %sweetie%.
Hi, %r%. Look, I... I just wanted to tell you...
I think you're a %gender(r,wonderful guy,beautiful girl)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Whoah, personal space.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: OMG I'm so sorry! I didn't... I thought...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Just don't touch me, all right?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hi, %r%. I can't help but notice you are looking particularly good today. You go to the gym?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I do. Go ahead and feel these guns.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh wow... I hope I'm not being too forward.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %sweetie%, why do you think I go to the gym?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well the results are showing, and I like what I see.
%r%, I know what you need, and %o% doesn't have it. You need someone who can take care of you.
You need someone who can give you a massage like me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh wow, that felt really good, and you didn't even reach me!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Forget about %o% and there's more from where that came from.
Come here %r%. You look tense.
Let these hands soothe you. Relax...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Get your hands off me.
I know your reputation, %i%. You're not breaking *my* heart.
What the hell was that?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hee hee. So, what's going on with you %r%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Argh, you are the most socially awkward person I have ever met.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You look tense %r%. Come over here and let me give you a massage?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No you don't. I heard about the time when %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Word gets around, I guess.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. And you're not getting anywhere around me.

Instantiation.name: PhysicalFlirt - (SS1 Act-1) All the Wrong Reasons

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Why hello, %r%. You're certainly looking fantastic today.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh... thanks %i%. I was just on my way to go study for the bio final.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: And that's EXACTLY what I wanted to talk to you about, %sweetie%.
You're SO smart and SO good at biology. And I've been so busy with getting ready for the Prom and everything... I've hardly had time to study at all!
I don't suppose you'd mind a pretty %gender(i,boy,girl)% sitting behind you and taking a few subtle glances at your desk during the test, would you, hot stuff?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: But %i%, that would be CHEATING!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %shocked%! What an ugly word. I prefer to think of it as 'helping out a friend.'
A very special friend.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Like... a %gender(i,boy,girl)%friend sort of friend?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I suppose. See you later, uh, %sweetie%.

Instantiation.name: Physical Flirt - Person flirts with best friend's girlfriend/boyfriend.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I heard you and %o% weren't as close as before, so I was thinking of cheering you up by-
Tickling you!
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey stop! Quit it!
You always know how to cheer me up. I just wish %o% could figure it out, too.

Instantiation.name: PhysicalFlirt - (SS8 Act-3) Scrooge meets the ghost of Christmas Present

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hello m'dear. You seem to have a healthy glow about you today. You are positively radiant!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yes, I'm taking a constitutional, free from the thick air which surrounds that lout %o%.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Did somebody say my name? Ah, %r%! It is good to see you!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: My dear... you should really be kinder to %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Fine. Long life to him. A merry Christmas and a happy new year! - he'll be very merry and very happy, I have no doubt.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yes, you are still in the throes of your haunting, %o%! You have but one spirit left after I.
LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Oh, I guess I'm still invisible.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nay, for I am that merry wanderer of the night The Ghost of Christmas Present!
LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Wait, you can see me this time, %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That display was an image of the present! %i% and %r% truly did have that exchange-it seems %pron(r,he/she)% is a trifle angry with you, still!
LineOfDialogue.otherLine: But I just saw you talking with %r% not a moment ago!
I'll woo her! We loved each other once, and we shall do so again!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Good luck, my friend... The Ghost of Christmas Future awaits...

Instantiation.name: PhysicalFlirt - I likes R who is dating I's enemy O Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Just thought you needed a look at these poses I've been working on.
Probably more action than you ever get with %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'll have you know that...
Hmmm, that does look pretty good.

Instantiation.name: PhysicalFlirt - I likes R who is dating I's enemy O Reject

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Just thought I would come by here and stretch a bit.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Okay. What did you need me for then?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was thinking you just needed to see what you were missing by going out with that loser %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Doesn't look like I'm missing too much.
